Classes/Voxer.html#/s:8VoxerKit0A0C4user.name: user
Classes/Voxer.html#/s:8VoxerKit0A0C4user.abstract: A User object that is logged in to the Voxer network.

Classes/Voxer.html#/s:8VoxerKit0A0C10cre.name: createUser(username:firstName:lastName:avatarUri:appId:appSecret:completion:)
Classes/Voxer.html#/s:8VoxerKit0A0C10cre.abstract: Create a new user and store it in the local database base as well as on the server. it must be logged in before calling this method.

Classes/Voxer.html#/s:8VoxerKit0A0C11get.name: getPlayable(from:)
Classes/Voxer.html#/s:8VoxerKit0A0C11get.abstract: Get a Playable object from a message.

Classes/Conversation.html#/s:8VoxerKit12.name: startRecording()
Classes/Conversation.html#/s:8VoxerKit12.abstract: Start audio recording for this conversation. The app must be given permission to record audio before calling this method.

Classes/Conversation.html#/s:8VoxerKit12.name: stopRecording()
Classes/Conversation.html#/s:8VoxerKit12.abstract: Stop audio recording. Only call this method after you have called startRecording().

Classes/Conversation.html#/s:8VoxerKit12.name: getMessageFetchedResultsController()
Classes/Conversation.html#/s:8VoxerKit12.abstract: Get the Core Data NSFetchedResultsController of Message type

Classes/Conversation.html#/s:8VoxerKit12.name: isSentFromUser(for:)
Classes/Conversation.html#/s:8VoxerKit12.abstract: Check to see if a Message is sent from the current logged in User

Classes/Conversation.html.name: Conversation
Classes/Conversation.html.abstract: Represents Conversation betweeen two users. This class allows the sdk users to send & receive text and audio messages
